div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xx die marcij
anno quo supra

The said day Alexander malisone schew to the prouest and balyeis that he wantit iiijor mettis
of Salt of Williame tingyat' Skippar pertening to Sanct nicholes tharfor he protestit
it suld' be defaltit iin his maile gif he gettis nay pament of the said' salt

The saide day Adam of Weir' was conuict be ane suorne assis' Dauy menyeis forspekar
for the forstalling of the burghe' in bying of Skinnis et cetera for the quhilkis he was
in ane Amerciament of the court et cetera and tile amende as law wile and forber' in tyme to Cum

The saide day Adam Weir was conuict be ane Suorne assis' Dauy menyeis forspekar
for the forstalling of the burghe in bying of woll et cetera

The saide' day the Counsale of the toune present for the tyme Counsalit patry Red'
to decist fra the occupacioun of the tale of the yarde follouit be Johne malison'
And' the said' Johne to occupy the saide taile as he did' obefor but preiudice to the
richt of the said' taile quhile thai salbe mair' Richt

Eodem die Walterus Wagraill conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore patricij Rede prelocutoris eiusdem
pro perturbio patricij Walcar Et Idem Patricius conuictus pro perturbio dicti Walterj et quilibet
eorum alteri emendabit ut Jura volunt et cetera
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiijo die mensis marcij anno quo supra

Eodem die thomas Ridale fecit constituit creauit et nominauit thomam leslie summ verum legitimum et Indubitatem
procuratorem actorem et factorm dans et concedens eidem suam presentatem et manddatum speciale ad respondendum Andree
Kennerty in actionibus inter se debatabilibus ac in omnibus aliis actionibus causis et querelis ipsum
concernens et cetera pro Agendum prosequendum defendendum Calumpniandum promisit' dictus constituens de Rato
et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij Cum ceteris clausulis necesseriis et Oportunis

add.foreign: deposiciones testamentum inter thomam menyeis et patricium leslie

div.p:
The said' day Johne matlande deponit be his aithe that patry leslie bad him mend' the
Cobill and he suld pay the half of the costis of the mendin of the samyn quhilk in
the thingis done be him extendis to vij or viij s'

Thome Coule deponit Obefor that thomas patry leslie bad' him beyt the Cobill and he suld'
pay the half of costis of the beting of the samyn Cobill

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvij die
mensis marcij Anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo quinto sexto

The said day thome' Wod' grauntit to fynd nichtbourschip to georgis gordoun'
anent ane part of fisching of ane hald nethis of the Raik pertenying to the
said' georgis as terce to Isabell Rait and' to fynd him his man and'
cobill to lawbour the samyn fisching the sad' georgis makand' cost
tharuppoun' as he dois corespondand' to the quantite of the said'
fisching the said georgis fyndand his graitht conuenient tharto

The said' day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' patry leslie forspekar
anent the borghe' fundin one Williame scherar' litstar be William cheishame
for the wranguis haldin fra him of thre li' with the mair' et cetera becaus'
Johne of Cullane forspekar for the said' William scherar' allegit the said'
thre pundis assignit to him for his keile hyer' for vpbringand' of the gudis
in Willekannis schip and askit ane day to preiwe his said' allegeance
that gif the said' Johnez preuis be Scottismen' he sale preiwe It one
the law day In the hed' court of the said burghe next eftir pasche
Immediate hereftir follouing be ony of the marinaris of the said' Schip that
gathtreit the fraucht or hed' reule of hir' for the tyme Ande gif his prewe
be vteuthe the Realme he sale preiw it within tene dais aftir the cumin
of the first Schip out of the portis of flandris or zeland' Eftir the first
Schip sayland' out of the port of Abirdene cumis in ony partis of zeland'
or flaundris Ande gif he falyeis in his preiwe as said' Is the said'
burghe' fundin be the said' William cheishame salbe availe Ande gif he preuis
It the said' borghe' salbe of nayn' availe

The said' day the borghe fundin one Alexander mydiltoune in Skeyne be Alexander
prat for the wranguis' haldin fra him of tua ky was fundin of nayn'
availe for the quhilkis the said' Alexander prat was in ane Amerciament of the
Court et cetera and the said' Alexander mydiltoun' quyt of his challance he payand
to him x s'

Eodem die georgius meldrum feodator de fyve fecit constituit creauit et nominauit
thomam leslie suum legitimum et Indubitatem procuratorem Actorem et factorem dans et concedens
eidem suam liberam et integram presentatem ad prosequendum plegium per eum aliis super
Johannem Kintor porrectum pro iniusta detencione ab eo
Agendum prosequendum defendendum et cetera Ceteram omnia et Singula faciendum In premisse
et cetera promittens de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratoi Cum ceteris clausulis
necessariis et oportunis

The said day the alderman and bailyes assignit monunday that nixt cummis to
criste prat to ansuer to bill of airschip gevin be William still one him

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxviij die marcij
anno quo supra

The said' day the wif of Johne ramsay the wif of Sandy brabner'
the wif of Johne meldrum the wif of Androw stevart the wif of mathou
branche the wif of Androw lousone Jonet Kyntor margaret litstar the
wif of William portar the wif of William sken' the wif of William
the relict of morice talyour the wif of philp Kelly the wif of Richerd
redhed' the wif of Johne Kennerty the thekaris wyf the wif of george
barbour' the wif of Johne flessour the wif of Johne frostar the wif of John
grig Ellene lok the wif of thome straloche the wyf of Johne balgerscho
the wif of Duncane portar And' the wif of Alexander prat conuict for haldin of
wrangis mesouris poyntis and quartis and for Selling of aile wyn' with the

The said' day It was commavndit ordanit and chargit In our' Souerane
lordis nayme prouest balyeis and officiaris of the said' burghe that within viij dais
next eftir follouing Ilkane broustar within thie burghe' sale ger' mak ane
poynt of tyne haldande mesour' with the Richtuis' Ingaile and mett Ande
that Ilkane of thame be Signit with the stampe and pas' to Dauy thomas and ger'
him mett the said' pontis with the Ingale and se that thai hald' in lik and that the
labour' Ande that thai aile be sauld' bot with j pont of tyn' mesourit with
thar' haile broustar and brevin of common ordinance And' thai chargit and'
commandit be oppin proclamacioun' at the mercat croce that nay manere
of persone suld' ask and tak ony strakis or goupnys of meile or'
malt vndir the panis of brekin of commone ordinance

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem penultimo die
mensis marcij anno quo supra

The said' Dauy Kintor grantit to Cum to morne befor the prouest and balyeis
and ansuer at the Instance of ser Johne ruthirfurd' in ale thingis he hed'
to say to him

The said day the ballieis assignit to thomas lesly procurator for george meldrum
of fyve to preiwe how mony burdis ratheris and speris was deliuerit to Johne
of Kintor be the said' george and his factoris in kepin betuix this and the lawday
next eftir pasche hereftir follouing

The said' day Androw futhes grauntit to him ane Sufficient bow to Dauy coupar
to schut in at the haym' Cumin of the merchandis schipis out of flandris

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' ser Johnne Ruthirfurd' forspekar that the borghe
fundin one Johnne' brabner be Alexander burnat was of Nane awaill for the quhilkis the said Alexander was
in ane amerciament of the court And' the said assis' ordand' the said Alexander to pas to the said' Johnne brabner
buitht and' ressaue alsmekle Irne as he gat and' to pay the fraucht tharfor

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene Tenta in Pretorio eiusdem vltimo die mensis marcij Anno
quo supra

The said day Dauy Kintor grantit him aving to ser Johnne Ruthirfurd' ane boll of gret aitis
quhilk the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of lawe And' quhat the said' ser Johnez ser
uandis wald' the sueir the morne that the said Dauy Kintoris gudis did skaitht in his barn'
yard' he sale mak pament to the said' ser Johnne for the said' skaitht

The said day William still producit ane bill of airschip writin with Dauy stralochis
hand' at the command' and' charg of criste prat quhilkis pertenit to the said' Williame
be resone of airschip

The sext day of the monetht of aprile the yer' forsaid' Alexander thekar oblist him
be the batht of his bodie to theik and complet the haile bigyne in futy pertening
to gerge heruy with new thak and to tyrff of the ald' hadir one his avne expens'
betuix this and Rud' day next to Cum Ande gif the said' george previs nocht with the
witnes that It was the said' Alexandris condicioun to tak of the ald' hadir and theik it
with new hadir' Thane he sale recompens' the Costis maid be the said' Alexander atour'
his condicioun' In presence of gilbert menyeis prouest Alexander gray balye and ser nichol patir
son'

The said' day the prouest and balyeis assignit Wednisday the xxij day of aprile
next to Cum to Dauy Kintor to preiwe that Williame Watson' wantis the cow that
he clamys him in his defalt eftir the tenor of the actis maid' tharapon' Obefor

head.add: deposiciones testamentum penes vacce vendite Alexandro prat

div.p:
The viij day of aprile the yer' forsaide gilbert hay deponit he his aithe that Alexander
prat bocht ane cow fra him and gaf him j plak in arlys' and the said' cow is the said'
Alexandris and he assignit him to Cum one gud wednisday to feche hir' avay And'
Syme flessour come one monunday was viij dais bigan to him at his
hed' of his corne yerde and said' the saide Alexander prat send' him for the said'
cow to the takin he gaf him ane plak

the said' day henry crukschank deponit be his aithe that he saw gilbert hay
and Alexander prat to gidder in ardgrane Ande the said' gilbert said' to him
he sellit ane fed' cow to the said' Alexander and tane j plak in arlys

The xvij day of the monetht of aprile the yer' forsaide Dauy Donaldson'
oppinlie grauntit that the fewell quhilkis he hed' castyn' that Dauy mar'
was Complanteous' on' him was castyn one the gg ground' and land'
of Abirdene for commone gude and weill of the said' burghe

Curia Capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimo die
mensis Aprilis Anno Dominj Millesimo quingentesimo Sexto quo die Sectis vocatis et
Curia affirmata absentes patent et cetera

Andreas Watsoun in defectu presencie
Thomas Dauesoun' in defectu presencie
Alexander leitht in defectu presencie
Duncanus andersoun' in defectu presencie
Robertus Dauesoun' in defectu presencie
Willelmus Richerdsone in defectu presencie
thomas laisk in defectu presencie
Walterus lang in defectu presencie
Andreas baxtar in newburgh' in defectu presencie
Richardus Watsoune' in defectu presencie
thomas Watsone in govlis in defectu presencie
Johannes mar in dis' in defectu presencie
Thomas Wodman' in defectu presencie
Johannes Wilkesoune' in cromar in defectu presencie
Matheus reid in defectu presencie
Andreas brabner in defectu presencie
Symoun' methall in defectu presencie

Dauid menyes Johannes leslie de Warderis Johannes ruthirfurd' miles
Johannes Cullane Johannes Colisone Alexander mar' thomas leslie
Dauid mar' Willelmus portar patricius leslie Willelmus Wormet
Patricius chernsid' Johannes moir' Wille Colpe malcomus crag
gavinus murray et thomas Watsone

The said' day comperit Johne of Cullane ande offerit him to preiwe with thomas
leslie Norman leslie and William scherar' litstar the thre lib' follouit be Williame
cheishame et cetera assignit to him the saide Johne for his keilehyr' et cetera eftir the tenor of the
act maid' tharapon' Obefor

The said' day the prouest and ballieis continevit the decisioun' of the borghe and Recovnter
betuix Johne Cullane and Williame cheishame quhile friday that nixt Cumis
The said' day Johne of lochillis grauntit him ane Induellar' of this burgh'

The said' day Johne Kintor lauchfullie warnit Callit and nocht comperit tile
ansuer to the borghe fundin on him be Johne leslie of warderis for the wranguis'
haldin fra him of eln' of quhit clatht price of the eln' iiij s' for the quhilkis
the said' Johne Kintor was in ane Amerciament of the court et cetera tharfor the balyeis ordanit
to tak ane stres' of the said' Johne and latt it agane to borghe' and it be askit
and warne him to Comper on' friday that next cumis tile ansuer to the said' borghe

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus et venerabilis vir magister Dauid menyes Collector
ac procurator capellanorum chorj ecclesie parrochiali dicti burgi et protestatus fuit in forma Juris
pro vno annuo Redditu quinque solidorum monete scocie dictis capellanis a longo tempore debito
et non soluto de quadam terra vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum ex orientali parte
vie regie qua Itur ad le polbrig prope Cimiterium dicte ecclesie inter terram quondam
Rogerj Werecaile ex australi ex vna et terram thome gledstane ex boreali partibus
ab altera et cetera Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus
Johanne auchneiwe Richardo litstar et Andrea nachtj seriando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram venerabilis vir magistri Dauid menyeis Collector ac procurator
capellanorum chorj eccleise beati nicholaij dicti burgi et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno
annuo redditu viginti solidorum monete scocie dictis capellanis a longo tempore debito et non soluto
de quadam terra vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico Inferiore ecclesie ex occidentali parte eiusdem
vici inter terram quondam Alexandri chamer ex boreali ex vna et terram quondam thome prat ex australi
partibus ab altera et communionem viam regiam versus oriens Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam tercio die
huius processus Testibus Johanne auchneywe Richardo litstar et Andrea nachtj seriando tanquam tercio die

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Johannes Reid' capellanus altarum
sanctorum Ninianj Episcopi et laurencij martiris infra ecclesiam parrochialem sanctj nicholaij de Abirdene
situati et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu quinque solidorum sibi et
a longo tempore debito et non soluto de quadam terra vasta quondam Dauid galychlie
Jacente in vico Nauium ex occidentali parte eiusdem inter terram quondam Willelmum Kymdy
constabilarij de Aberdene ex boreali ex vna Et terram quondam Richardi craufurd'
ex occidentali et communionem viam regiam versus oriens Ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia
tanquam 3o die huius processus Testibus

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vie dominus Alexander Rauff collector
capellanorum collegij ecclesie cathedrali abirdonensis et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo
Redditu trium solidorum et quatuor d' vsualis monete scocie dictis capellanis annuatim debito
et a longo tempore non soluto de quadam terra vasta quondam patricij couper Jacente
in le Ratioun' Raw inter terram thome gray carnificis ex occidentali Et terram
Alexander scherar ex orientali et communionem viam regiam versus austrum Ad quam terram
accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo
presentauit curia tanquam 3o huius processus testibus Johanne auchenyv Ricardo litstar et Normundo
lesly seriando
